images.name: 1745890097994.png
images.prompt: p: Generate a regal composition showcasing the deity Indra, leading a celestial army, known as the Deva Army, in the heavenly realm of Svarga. Indra, the leader, is detailed with a robust physique, adorned with traditional divine attire and a radiant crown, holding a thunderbolt symbolising his power and strength. The Deva Army, comprises of male and female divine beings, comes in a variety of Southeast Asian descents. They are armored in ornate celestial clothing, each carrying weapons representative of their unique abilities. The backdrop is a breathtaking vista of Svarga, a place known for its grandeur and divine ambience, filled with remarkable fragrant flowers, splendid structures and vibrant celestial bodies.

images.name: 1746235591508.png
images.prompt: p: Illustrate the theme of a classical writer, deeply rooted in ancient Vedic culture. The scene should be set in an old study full of scrolls and manuscripts, with soft lighting illuminating the room. The writer is a mid-aged South Asian man, in traditional attire, sitting cross-legged on a woven mat. He holds an antique, feathered quill in his hand, deeply immersed in his writing. The atmosphere is serene, with a gentle scent of incense in the air. This image will serve as a centerpiece for the posts section of a knowledge-sharing platform.

images.name: 1746585456111.png
images.prompt: p: A detailed image showing the concept of engineering for an educational website. The image features a middle-eastern woman and a South Asian man, both engineers, engaged in active discussion in front of a large chalkboard filled with engineering blueprints and calculations. On a side table, there is model of a skyscraper, mechanical gears, a safety helmet and blueprints, symbolizing civil, mechanical and architectural engineering. They are in a well-lit, industrial-style workspace with computers and various engineering tools around. The atmosphere is focused and creative, representing the problem-solving nature of engineering.

images.name: 1746585543661.png
images.prompt: p: Create an image depicting the engineering section of a website named Indra.ai, designed in the style of a chalkboard visible within a vacant classroom. Please make sure the chalkboard appears hand-drawn and meticulously detailed, with relevant technical terms and diagrams scribbled across it, just as if it was used in a rigorous engineering class. Aside from the chalkboard, include the prerequisite elements of a typical classroom - a teacher's desk, some empty chairs, and glass windows, but ensure that no people are present in this image.
